title: Workshop on Balancing Formal and Informal Design in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of structured asynchronous language learning environments' pros/cons and development of flexible learning strategies

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more formalized learning elements (e.g., auto-graded quizzes) in online language learning.
Learners can design informal learning activities (e.g., open discussions) integrating two or more motivational elements.
Learners can revise learning plans with 80% or higher accuracy using a checklist that evaluates formal-informal balance in mobile learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
